## BlinnLightModel.envBRDF() method

Calculates BRDF of environment lighting for current fragment

**Signature:**

```typescript
/** @override */
envBRDF(envLight: EnvironmentLighting, scope: PBInsideFunctionScope): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  envLight | [EnvironmentLighting](doc/markdown/./scene.environmentlighting.md) | The environment lighting object |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | The shader scope |

void
